title: Weirdo Vs. Weirdo: Johnny Depp Vs. Amber Turd | Daily Best of April 21 | Rick & Bubba
description:
The courtroom gets weird as Johnny Depp and Amber Heard air their dirty laundry (literally). Alabama Coach Nick Saban weighs in on the college transfer portal. Kamala Harris gives us an inspiring speech about space. Piers Morgan reveals a heavily edited teaser for his upcoming Trump interview. And Garry The Spurmaster gives us advice on how to remove a tick. 
Learn more about your ad choices. Visit megaphone.fm/adchoices
